amendment.description: At the end of the bill ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to fund the appropriation in this Act for State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance, $2 million shall be available to provide grants to develop, expand, and strengthen victim service programs for victims of trafficking.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Sali amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Sali.
